I agree with Stirker2005, this is no more than an update of the last game. Same crap graphics, terrible car sounds, and if its possible, even worse support for steering wheels.

I haven't tried it yet, but if it has decent handling I'll take it over Dirt 3's ridiculously long loading times any day. Graphics don't matter so much because who has time to stare at your texture quality while your going 150mph.

Thanks for the torrent EZ!

but I feel like I wasted my bandwidth on this, and even my money too as I bought it!

It's AWFUL. I have a logitech G27 and even with the steering linearity set to max I have to make really large turns just to move the car a little. And with force feedback turned on I can still hardly feel anything the car is doing.

I'll be looking to get a refund if they dont patch this games wheel support in the next couple of weeks.
